name: Brain Challenge
synopsis: Just like your body, your brain needs exercise to stay in shape! Brain Challenge is a simple, entertaining solution for stimulating your neurons that goes way beyond logic tests. Thanks to a complete range of 48 mini-games, Brain Challenge provides an exceptional variety of exercises. Not only can you train your brain for Math but also for 4 other categories: Logic, Focus, Memory and Visual! Plus an original Stress Mode, featuring multitasking and authority challenges. Plus, you can now personalize your profile and some exercises with your own photos!
